metadata.title: instayum Women's Perfume Spray - Bubbly Berry, 1.7 oz 50 mL - Darling and Delectable Fragrance with the Notes of Champagne and Frozen Raspberry - Tru Fragrance & Beauty
description: instayum is a fragrance made for Foodies who appreciate the delicacies of a good bite. This fragrance translates the foodie experience into a fine fragrance with the notes of Champagne and Frozen Raspberry.
